courses.title: Graphic Design Basics
courses.description: Master the foundational principles of graphic design, including color theory, typography, and layout.

courses.title: UX/UI Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn how to create user-friendly interfaces and experiences through this comprehensive course.

courses.title: Advanced Photoshop Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your Photoshop skills with advanced techniques for photo editing and manipulation.

courses.title: Branding Essentials
courses.description: Develop your understanding of branding strategies and learn how to create a compelling brand identity.

courses.title: Illustration Techniques
courses.description: Learn various illustration styles and techniques to bring your artistic visions to life.

courses.title: Web Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Dive into web design basics, including HTML, CSS, and responsive design principles.

courses.title: Social Media Graphics
courses.description: Create eye-catching graphics for social media platforms and learn how to enhance engagement.

courses.title: Color Theory in Design
courses.description: Understand the psychological effects of color and how to use it effectively in your designs.

courses.title: Typography for Designers
courses.description: Explore the art of typography and learn how to choose and pair fonts effectively.

courses.title: Motion Graphics Essentials
courses.description: Discover the basics of creating engaging motion graphics for videos and presentations.
